description: Aproemsurt is an association of beekeepers located in Chaparral, Tolima, founded on September 10, 2009. The organization currently has 26 members and is structured with a board of directors, including positions such as president, vice-president, treasurer, and legal representative, along with a general assembly comprising all members. Each member maintains their own hives, and while the association has its own hives, it aims to eventually serve as a collection center for honey, purchasing from both members and non-members.
name: Aproemsurt
